name: Generate All possible Palindromes
description: Identify all palindromic strings and count occurrences, then round to a specified number of decimal places. Return only string names that meet criteria.
source: OpenAI documentation
url: https://help.openai.com/en/articles/6654000-generate-palindromes-for-string-searching
inputs: 
  input_data:
    type: array (variable number of strings)
    name: palindromes
---
Generate all possible palindromes from text inputted by the user. The function will return a list of palindromes as well as their respective counts, rounded to specified decimal places.


Inputs:
  input_data: 
  -- 
  

    Text :

    Palindrome A: 

    -- 
  
    Name (required field) :

    -- 
    Decimal Places (optional) -> 2
evaluation:
The chatbot output does not comply with the description provided for several reasons:

1. Format Mismatch: The expected output format specified in the description requires specific sections for "Company names," "People names," "Specific topics," and "General themes," each followed by a comma-separated list. However, the chatbot output does not distinguish these sections clearly or follow the prescribed format.

2. Output Content: The information presented in the output example (e.g., "Compound name [APPLE] is owned by...") does not adhere to the structure required by the description. For example, there are no clearly labeled sections for company names or people names according to the specified format.

3. Included Unrelated Information: The second part of the output inaccurately references details ("Generate All possible Palindromes") that seem unrelated to both the description and the task of extracting elements from the text.

Based on these points, the chatbot output does not adhere to the guidelines stipulated in the description.
